author: Johanna
content: Bullish: Anyone betting against AMZN long term doesn’t understand this company. $200 is a steal.

author: Phish
content: Bezos sold so many shares here. This will dip back to 160-175

author: Jaime
content: Bullish: When AMZN starts to go below 200, I'll start buying and averaging down from there....

author: Kevin
content: Bullish: Inflation won’t stop AMZN. People still need Prime, and AWS is recession-proof. Staying long through the noise.

author: Kaiden
content: Bearish: Layoffs are a red flag. Trimming costs but burning cash on satellites. Hard pass for me.

author: Alana
content: Bezos sold more shares. Makes me wonder if insiders see headwinds ahead. Keeping my eye on volume here.

author: Mike
content: Should be a much bigger rebound today or it is time to sell. Stock has no legs over 200 ever.

author: Amelia
content: Prime Day crushed it, and Q4 always brings in massive numbers. Who’s holding for that $250 target?

author: scott
content: Bearish: How come nobody is concerned about the cost of launching 4,000 satellites over next 18 months to try to compete with Starlink. Starlink will simply lower price and they have 10 times more satellites than Amazon will have. When will investors actually get a dividend or meaningful stock buybacks?
